name: VOID (itch) (Almax)
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 45: "Start with Nothing"

VOID is a cross between a tactics strategy and card game

Start with nothing in your hand and nothing on the board

Defend the void and see that mystical YOU WIN text

Do it for the glory, do it for your mum, do it for no reason in particular, honestly we don’t care too much :)

Aaron & Greg
